ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 22 woes (or why Unrest STILL sucks)  LONG
ygData.msgSnippet: bah, screw the rug room. Go wax the predator and foreman. Much more fun. Draelon ... From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@illian.org] Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000
ygData.messageBody:
bah, screw the rug room.

Go wax the predator and foreman. Much more fun.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 3:11 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 22 woes (or why Unrest STILL sucks) LONG


From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>

4 words.

Sol A Safe Room

'nuff said

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 1:26 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 22 woes (or why Unrest STILL sucks) LONG
>
>
> From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>
>
> Gotta agree, get out of Unrest. I have a 23 bard that is stuck
> at 23 and 2
> bubbles in Unrest. I have been in Unrest for two weeks now and
> only gained
> half a bubble. I die at least once a night, usually due to bone-heads in
> the group.
>
> I left Antonica mainly because it was getting over camped in the Karanas.
> I decided to hunt Mistmoor and Unrest for a while. I did fairly well in
> Mistmoor my first few days, the rest of my days were terrible. I
> then went
> to Cauldron and found it impossible to find a person to hunt Tidal Lords
> with. I went to Unrest the past 2 weeks. I had not been there
> since April
> of '99 (it hasn't changed). Well like I said, I gained half a bubble. I
> went back out to Cauldron 2 days ago with a friend to hunt Tidal
> Lords, but
> the spawns were painfully slow. So I gave up on that. Back in to Unrest
> last night and another death. Now I am heading back to Karana area
> tonight. Oh, 2 weeks and I still have not been able to loot a
> bracelet for
> the bracer quest :(.
>
> Although Crier suggest decent places that are easy for you to
> hunt, I would
> advise avoiding these especially during prime time as they are generally
> camped to the teeth: Oasis (90+ people is too damn much), Chickens in SK
> (way over camped and I found the exp to be terrible, the centuars are much
> better), Scythe beetles (they really only spawn during the daylight hours
> and are rare compared to borer and pincer beetles, they should be
> blue to you.)
>
> I plan on going to Lake Rathe, Rathe Mountians or Highkeep basement (yes,
> yes, I know it is way over camped too but I am tied of the long corpse run
> right now)
>
>
> >Other nice places that are train-free are crocs in Oasis
> (deepwaters at your
> >level), Giant Skeletons in Rathe Mts., Aviaks in SK (dull),
> Scythe Beetles
> >in NK, DE guards in Nektulos, and if you can stand the
> occasional train try
> >Sol A, Permafrost, Upper Guk.
> >
> >[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
>
